reason: Created production env template with all externalized variables
Added .env.production to gitignore for secret protection
Created production compose with 9 services (3 SaaS + 3 workers + 3 schedulers)
Added @fastify/rate-limit — 100 req/min per tenant or IP
Restricted CORS to production URLs when NODE_ENV=production
Added Sentry error tracking integration (optional — uses SENTRY_DSN env var)
Replaced logger:true with structured pino config (JSON in prod — pino-pretty in dev)
Added global error handler with Sentry reporting
